replies.body: Welcome back!
replies.body_tagged: Welcome back!

replies.body:
Little heads up. Firstly, Welcome back to the Avicus Network!

Appeals usually work like this. Normally due to previous experience you need to wait:

  • 1+ months if banned for "Abusing other players/Staff abuse/Toxicity".
  • 4+ months if banned for advertising.
  • 6+ months if banned for "Hacking".
  • 9+  months if banned for one of the above and then "Ban Evading"
Have I missed any? Just hmu with a reply or mods can edit this and make it more accurate.
replies.body_tagged:
